title: Github Repo Manager
content: Github Repo Manager documentation. A command-line tool to interactively manage GitHub repositories with powerful features including interactive terminal UI, pagination for repositories, filtering by name or visibility, dry run mode, and confirmation steps to prevent accidental operations.

title: Introduction
content: Introduction to Github Repo Manager. Learn about the key features and capabilities of this powerful GitHub repository management tool that helps you efficiently manage your repositories.
description: Introduction section for Github Repo Manager

title: Installation
content: Installation guide for Github Repo Manager. Learn how to install via pip with 'pip install github-repo-manager' or from source code by cloning the repository and installing locally.
description: Installation guide for Github Repo Manager

title: Setup
content: Setup guide for Github Repo Manager. Learn how to configure your GitHub token and username to authorize access to your repositories. Includes setting up environment variables and command-line options.
description: Setup guide for Github Repo Manager

title: Changelog
content: Changelog for Github Repo Manager. View all version updates and feature additions to track the development history of this tool.

title: Usage
content: Usage guide for Github Repo Manager. Learn how to use the interactive UI and command line options to manage your GitHub repositories efficiently and safely.
description: Usage section for Github Repo Manager

title: Getting Started
content: Getting started with Github Repo Manager. Learn the basics of managing your repositories including navigating the interface, selecting repositories, and performing operations.
description: Getting started guide for Github Repo Manager

title: Configuration
content: Configuration options for Github Repo Manager. Learn about all available command line arguments and options to customize how the tool works with your repositories.
description: Configuration guide for Github Repo Manager

content: Customization guide for Github Repo Manager. Learn how to adapt the tool for your specific workflow needs and integrate it with other tools.
